channel.title: Recruiting 2 Great Coders!
channel.description:
[b]Hi, I am going to be making a 317 Private Server! I am going to need 2 amazing coders to help with the client. We are going to be using VBulletin Fourms (Already Made) and ventrilo. We will be making the server from scratch so be ready to work. =] The coders will be given a coder rank and be given the same permissions as the owner. To apply for a coder position you are going to need to be a really great coder. We will be using ventrilo to communicate to each other so, it will be helpful if you have a computer mic. If you have any questions regarding a coder position feel free to private message me or reply on this thread. Ok then, here is the fourm you must fill out to apply for the coding position.[/b]
[u][b]How long have you been Coding games/Clients?: How old are you?: What country do you live in?: Do you work well with others?: Do you have an email account/msn? If so please provide: Do you have a microphone?: Have you used VBulletin?:[/b][/u]

item.title: Recruiting 2 Great Coders!
item.dc:creator: @Milbauer Milbauer
item.description:
@Milbauer wrote:

Hi, I am going to be making a 317 Private Server! I am going to need 2 amazing coders to help with the client. We are going to be using VBulletin Fourms (Already Made) and ventrilo. We will be making the server from scratch so be ready to work. =] The coders will be given a coder rank and be given the same permissions as the owner. To apply for a coder position you are going to need to be a really great coder. We will be using ventrilo to communicate to each other so, it will be helpful if you have a computer mic. If you have any questions regarding a coder position feel free to private message me or reply on this thread. Ok then, here is the fourm you must fill out to apply for the coding position.

How long have you been Coding games/Clients?:
How old are you?:
What country do you live in?:
Do you work well with others?:
Do you have an email account/msn? If so please provide:
Do you have a microphone?:
Have you used VBulletin?:
